entities.name: reg
entities.description: Reg is a person who is being referred to by Mrs. Cattermole. She throws herself into his arms and asks for his help.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is present in the scene. He is disengaging himself from Mrs. Cattermole's hug.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is present in the scene. She has a Patronus that vanishes with a pop.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is present in the scene and is being referred to by Hermione.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is a person who was attacked by Runcorn.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a person who was attacked by Runcorn and has a hole in her office door.

entities.name: runcorn
entities.description: Runcorn is a person who let Mrs. Cattermole out and told everyone to leave the country.

relationships.description: Hermione is concerned about Harry if they are trapped in the Ministry.
Reg and Ron seem to be related, as Mrs. Cattermole refers to Reg by name and throws herself into his arms.
Harry is helping Hermione by addressing the situation and trying to move fast.
